title: Fed Raises Interest Rate By Half Point, Ratcheting Up Its Inflation Fight
sub_head: Central bank officials also announced plans to start shrinking their $9 trillion asset portfolio, another step to tighten policy
body:
The Federal Reserve approved a rare half-percentage-point interest rate increase and announced plans to shrink its $9 trillion asset portfolio starting next month in a double-barreled effort to reduce inflation that is running at a four-decade high.
The moves, announced after a two-day policy meeting Wednesday, will raise the central bankâ€™s benchmark federal-funds rate to a target range between 0.75% and 1%.
